summary: High Definition Dragon Bones with 5x customisable chunks of meat
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30620/?][b][i][color=red][*]/// Bloody Dragon Bones 1.1 RELEASED! Now compatible with Enhanced HD Dragon Bones///[/color][/b][/url][/center]
[center][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/121231/iu7y7kl3.jpg[/img][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/130108/5n6f6atd.jpg[/img][youtube]T9s5rY43vzo[/youtube][img]http://s14.directupload.net/images/130108/br3knb3z.jpg[/img][/center][line]

[center][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/121226/5t3z862x.jpg[/img][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/121231/clk9ibsu.gif[/img][url=http://s7.directupload.net/images/130103/xe59cs6x.gif][img]http://s1.directupload.net/images/130103/z8qbfmhc.gif[/img][/url][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/121231/3dr2cmga.gif[/img][/center][center]///[b][i]More screenshots can be found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/192537]here[/url]![/i][/b]///[/center][line]
[center][b]other standalone retextures:[/b][/center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30331/][img]http://s1.directupload.net/images/130128/rkyqkt6a.gif[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30620/][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/130128/sqbq2vcu.gif[/img][/url][line]


[img]http://s1.directupload.net/images/121226/g9jn9428.jpg[/img]
[b]/// 1.6 is UP ///[/b]
[u]NEWS:[/u]
[list][b][i][color=red][*]post your thoughts, screenshots and the ENB you are using[/color] =)[/b][/i][/list]
Dragon Skeleton info:
old resolution:
[list][*][i]256x256[/i]
new resolutions:
[*][i]1024x1024[/i]
[*][i]2048x2048[/i]
[*][i]4096x4096[/i][/list]



[b][u]UPDATES:[/u][/b]

v1.6:
[list][*]improved the specularity of the skeleton:
priority of specularity:
1.flesh (max)
2.cracks
3.surface[/list]

v1.5
[list][*]complete new normalmaps for every resolution
[*]reworked the skeleton as well as the flesh parts with real heightmaps
[*]changed the look of option 3
[*]added alternative options for 1k/2k
[*]added an only skeleton version for all resolutions[/list]
v1.4:
only effects lower resolutions!
added screenshots to compare!
2k changes:
[list][*]more detail on the normalmap
[*]distinct cracks on the skeleton
[*]10%darker
1k changes:
[*]more detail on the normalmap
[*]improveded cracks on the skeleton
[*]smoother transitions on the texture
[*]10% darker[/list]
v1.3c:
[list][*]added 3 optional looks (muscle fibres)[/list]
v1.3:
changes:
[list][*]adjusted skeleton texture quality
[*]teeth are now the same color as the rest of the skeleton
[*]skeleton is now 10% more saturated
[*]changed the look of the type 5 flesh
[*]improved the normalmap for the skeleton
[*]removed the alternative flesh textures from the download list
(dont worry! will add in a future update again)
additions:
[*]added normalmap for the flesh structure
[*]added 1k version based on the updates of the 4k one
[*]added 2k version based on the updates of the 4k one[/list]
v1.2:
[list][*]added a 4k version
[*]added a heightmap/normalmap
[*]adjusted the contours and brightness of the flesh[/list]
v1.1:
[list][*]teeth are now 40% darker
[*]added a 1k resolution version[/list]
v1.0:
[list][*]release (wip)[/list]


[img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/121226/ii4amet8.jpg[/img]
[u]install:[/u]
use NMM to install this mod or just drop the data folder in your main skyrim directory.

[u]uninstall:[/u]
use NMM or remove the 2 files "dragonskeleton.dds" and "dragonskeleton_n.dds" from the following folder:
.../data/textures/actors/dragon/

[u]Compatibility & additional INFO[/u]
This mod should cause no bugs or any kind of CTD. however if you started to experience crashes right after installing this mod, it is because you are running out of GPU memory. in that case use a lower resolution version of this mod =)


[color=red]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/color]
If you like this mod, don't forget to support me =)
[color=red]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/color]



[center][color=orange]Permissions
You are not allowed to use any textures of this mod whithout my permission!
Do not upload or distribute these files on other sites![/color][/center]
